text: Once upon a time there was a rich man in Sung's kingdom. After a downpour, the wall of his house began to fall. "If you don't fix that wall", his son told him, "there can be a thief in there". An old neighbor gave him the same warning. That same night a large sum of money was stolen from the rich man, who praised his son's intelligence, but distrusted his old neighbor. FIN
title: El muro desmoronado
author: nan Anónimo
